title: More Than 1,000 Afghan Forces Flee to Tajikistan as Taliban Continues to Gain Ground
content:
1. More Than 1,000 Afghan Forces Flee to Tajikistan as Taliban Continues to Gain Ground  Slate
  2. More than 1,000 Afghan soldiers flee into Tajikistan as Taliban extends control, Tajik officials say  The Washington Post
  3. Taliban Find New Revenues as They Seize Afghanistan’s U.S.-Built Border Gateway  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Tajikistan deploys more troops in Afghan border as Taliban get closer to its territory - The Khaama Press News Agency  The Khaama Press News Agency
  5. Afghanistan Endgame: What does a 2 trillion dollar war look like?  Sky News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
